name: KCee
description: '''Kingsley Chinweike Okonkwo'''{{Audio|LL-Q33578 (ibo)-Achalugo2009-Kcee.wav|Listen|help=no}}, better known as '''KCee''',{{efn|sometimes stylised as '''Kcee'''}} is a [[Nigerian]] singer and songwriter. He was formerly in the hip-hop duo KC Presh. He is from Amaputu in [[Uli, Anambra|Uli]] in Ihiala local government area in [[Anambra State]], Nigeria. He currently has a record deal with Five Star Music. He worked with [[Del B]], a record producer known for producing Kcee's popular song "[[Limpopo (song)|Limpopo]]". He is the elder brother to E-money.
